name: Football Ranking
author: https://www.oddsvalue.com

sections.description:
Give your users access to updated world rankings for international football (soccer) teams.
This plugin rely on data from https://www.oddsvalue.com

Features

  • FIFA Ranking for all national football teams
  • Both men and womens teams
  • Always up-to-date with latest rankings

Data

This service is utilizing the data storage at oddsvalue.com and will contact this server to retrieve updated data for showing these rankings.
The Oddsvalue.com server is located in Denmark, EU.

Display football rankings

  • Use [football_ranking] shortcode where you want to display the live scores.
  • You can change fonts and colors in the Settings >> Football Ranking admin menu

Supported languages

  • English
  • Danish
  • Macedonian
  • Serbian
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “Football Ranking” to the folder: /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the “Football Ranking” through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin from Settings > Football Ranking in your admin menu
  4. Use [football_ranking] shortcode where you want to display the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the “Football Ranking” to the folder: /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the “Football Ranking” through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin from Settings > Football Ranking in your admin menu
  4. Use [football_ranking] shortcode where you want to display the plugin

How can I display the Football Ranking plugin

Use [football_lineups] shortcode wherever you want.

Is it free?

Yes, it is free. We will show some non-intrusive ads.

Is the plugin responsive?

Yes

How does the plugin get the data

The data for official rankings are collected by oddsvalue.com data servers. Your plugin will contact oddsvalue.com to get the raw data for outputting.
